channel.title: hobbies on ThreeFeetDeep

item.title: horsie to bish three
item.description: A few suggestions for punny usernames if you sign up to an online chess site, e.g. chess.com PawnBroker KnightKnight CheckOutOperator CheckThisOut KingHell HorsieToBishThree The last is my personal favourite, from Red Dwarf Series 2 Episode 5 Queeg vs Holly :-)
